description: ​The U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has reported a massive increase in losses to Bitcoin ATM scams, nearly ten times the amount from 2020 and reaching over $110 million in 2023. [...]
title: FTC: Over $110 million lost to Bitcoin ATM scams in 2023

description: Zyxel has released security updates to address a critical vulnerability impacting multiple models of its business routers, potentially allowing unauthenticated attackers to perform OS command injection. [...]
title: Zyxel warns of critical OS command injection flaw in routers

description: ​Microsoft has released a new Workspaces PowerToy that helps launch sets of applications using custom desktop layouts and configurations with a mouse click. [...]
title: New Windows PowerToy launches, repositions apps to saved layouts

description: The FBI warns of North Korean hackers aggressively targeting cryptocurrency companies and their employees in sophisticated social engineering attacks, aiming to deploy malware that steals their crypto assets. [...]
title: FBI warns crypto firms of aggressive social engineering attacks

description: D-Link is warning that four remote code execution (RCE) flaws impacting all hardware and firmware versions of its DIR-846W router will not be fixed as the products are no longer supported. [...]
title: D-Link says it is not fixing four RCE flaws in DIR-846W routers
